When i cut loose , i lose control.
We help each other out in my family.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I like to cook, but I'm not very good at it. I'm trying to become a vegetarian, but I'm having a hard time giving up meat.
I'm not a vegetarian, but I do like to eat a lot of vegetables. I'm a restaurant manager, and I work over 60 hours a week.
That sounds like a lot of work! I'm a teacher, and I only work 40 hours a week.
I know, it's a lot. But it's worth it. I love my job.
I'm glad to hear that. What do you like most about your job?
I like the people I work with, and I like the challenge of the job.
That's great. I like working with kids, and I like the feeling of making a difference in their lives.
That's really admirable. I wish I could make a difference in the world.
You can! Everyone can make a difference. We just have to find the right way to do it.
You're right. I'm going to start thinking about how I can make a difference.
That's great! I'm sure you'll figure out something.
